# Phyplot
http://www.sciphy.org/

Phyplot is a plotting library for use with Sci-Phy (statistical analysis and modelling of evolved data using phylogenetic trees).

## Authors
By Chris Organ & Andrew Meade

## Requirements
Python 3.8+
Sci-Phy
